item.title: Imperial Union Shorinji Kempo joins international seminar
item.description: Gassho! Two weeks ago, kenshi (or students) practising Shorinji Kempo, a Japanese martial art, flew in from around the world to participate in an intense two-day seminar held in Bristol. Kenshi from dojos in England, Scotland, Ireland, Spain, Czech Republic, Switzerland, and Japan all came to learn â€¦
